title: Missing Option to Set Club Tag
body: Link the title says, I have gotten the necessary amount of players for my little Club, but I now don't have the option to set a Club Tag. Was it because of today's update?

replies.body: The team is currently aware, and we've got a notice on our [Server Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) now :D We're working on a fix to go out soon.  Not sure if it'll be before next patch, but we'll see.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=X39dmHJK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-05T22:37:44.107+0000)
>
> The team is currently aware, and we've got a notice on our [Server Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) now :D We're working on a fix to go out soon.  Not sure if it'll be before next patch, but we'll see.

i hope it's fixed soon, also question, if all members leave a club does that clubs name and tag become available?

I'm having the same problem. Earlier this morning after I downloaded patch 6.9, the button was still there but I didn't have enough people in my club. When I got home later and after more people had joined, suddenly the button was missing. I'm guessing its a bug?
